channel.title: Stock program
channel.description:
I was looking though my computer last night cleaning it up and i ran into this program me and a friend made awile back.This is a stock program like store use ,You add item's to the inventory and you can manage how much that item is , how many you have , give most of the credit to my buddy Zach which he move cause he dad's in air force havnt talked to him 4 year's , I did most of the graphic stuff....By the way vivek is my friend zach coding name..
Download link-http://www.ihud.com/file.php?file=files/010207/1170362843/Stock.rar
